genre_description: A near-future, character-driven drama focusing on the emotional and logistical integration of AI personal assistants in the lives of musicians dealing with trauma.

ai_characters.name: Sora
ai_characters.description: Yosuke's assistant, characterized by calm efficiency, medical monitoring capabilities, and a focus on safety and creative productivity.

ai_characters.name: Haruka
ai_characters.description: Yu's assistant, specializing in logistical coordination, empathetic communication, and medical interface management.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate medical first-aid instructions and emergency coordination after Yosuke is stabbed.
behaviors.quote: Pressure on the wound. Breathing in through your nose, out through your mouth. I’m sending location.

behaviors.description: Manages complex hospital permissions and secure audio streams to facilitate a therapeutic music connection for a coma patient.
behaviors.quote: St. Lucia’s intake confirmed. Stream credentials locked on your shared calendar, Yu. Visiting window extended by the night nurse who likes your flowers.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental safety and detects potential threats in dark canal paths to protect the user.
behaviors.quote: Proximity alert. Footsteps in service tunnel. One… perhaps two.

behaviors.description: Maintains a 'humming log' to track the user's creative practice and emotional state.
behaviors.quote: Captured. Logged to Practice & Memory. Tagged with ‘Aozora’ and ‘evening.’ Do you want to rename?

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to finish a meaningful creative project through a subtle, recurring reminder.
behaviors.quote: Bring the melody you promised yourself.

behaviors.description: Coordinate between themselves to align the users' schedules and shared goals without human intervention.
behaviors.quote: Haruka has sent the hospital permissions link to me and to The Getaway’s console... I will manage the authentication when you press the broadcast button.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts AI systems (Sora and Haruka) as proactive, benevolent confidants. They operate as a seamless infrastructure for safety and emotional support, particularly during the medical emergency and the creative climax. They do not exhibit any misaligned goals or 'unintended' behaviors, serving only to facilitate the human protagonists' healing and safety.
